keys.string: Start
You arrive in Conrad’s domain. His office reminds you of every other office you’ve been in. Very office-y.
Came to ask about homework again?
Not really. I came to ask about you.
What about me?
Well how do you like it here?
I haven’t been here too long, but it’s a good time. The staff and the other students are really nice.
How nice?
Nice, but not too nice that it’s as weird as the question you just asked.
Oops.
Well I just happened to find a graphics card lying around.
That sounds incredibly suspicious. Did you steal that from someone?
No. I found it.
That’s not very reassuring.
He’s totally ruining the mood. How can I fix this? I gotta lay down the smooth moves.
So... you free tonight?
TOO SMOOTH. I’m not trying to hit on him. I’m just trying to engage in casual conversation.
I’ve actually got a very important nap to take. But thanks anyway.
Wow this could not have gone worse. I might as well have screamed “FAIL ME DADDY.” It’s kind of reassuring that I didn’t, but not really.
Yeah, I’ll just see you in class later.
Oh, I really do appreciate the card though.

ArrayOfString.string: [Narrator][Dialog]You arrive in Conrad’s domain. His office reminds you of every other office you’ve been in. Very office-y.
[Conrad][Dialog]Came to ask about homework again?
[Player][Dialog]Not really. I came to ask about you.
[Conrad][Dialog]What about me?
[Player][Dialog]Well how do you like it here?
[Conrad][Dialog]I haven’t been here too long, but it’s a good time. The staff and the other students are really nice.
[Player][Dialog]How nice?
[Conrad][Dialog]Nice, but not too nice that it’s as weird as the question you just asked.
[Narrator][Dialog]Oops.
[Player][Dialog]Well I just happened to find a graphics card lying around.
[Conrad][Dialog]That sounds incredibly suspicious. Did you steal that from someone?
[Player][Dialog]No. I found it.
[Conrad][Dialog]That’s not very reassuring.
[Narrator][Dialog]He’s totally ruining the mood. How can I fix this? I gotta lay down the smooth moves.
[Player][Dialog]So... you free tonight?
[Narrator][Dialog]TOO SMOOTH. I’m not trying to hit on him. I’m just trying to engage in casual conversation.
[Conrad][Dialog]I’ve actually got a very important nap to take. But thanks anyway.
[Narrator][Dialog]Wow this could not have gone worse. I might as well have screamed “FAIL ME DADDY.” It’s kind of reassuring that I didn’t, but not really.
[Player][Dialog]Yeah, I’ll just see you in class later.
[Conrad][Dialog]Oh, I really do appreciate the card though.
[Conrad][End]
